text.headline: Tropical Golf Resort
text.text:
The proposed Panglao Golf and Country Club: This 18-hole championship course will be located in Panglao, just a short drive from Tagbilaran City. The course will be designed by world-renowned US golf course architect confidential at the present time.

The Panglao Resort Project is $545 million USD development currently underway in Panglao, Bohol, Philippines.

The project is being developed by the Alturas Group. The project will build out six hotel resort complexes with additional residential housing. The first phase of the project, which is currently underway, will include the construction of the initial infrastructure, i.e. roads/water/power. The second phase starting in 2024 will include the construction of the remaining entertainment resorts and amenities. The average temperature in Bohol is 27 degrees Celsius or 81 degrees Fahrenheit. Humidity remains high throughout the year, averaging 80%.
